name: TalkboDailyChat
0:
”Alexa open daily chat”
”start daily chat”
”ask daily chat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily chat
des: This skill is for TEFL teachers to help revision of day to day English in common use. This will be especially useful to non-native English teachers, who want to teach their students to speak clearly and accurately.
